body_text:
How did Ryuk trick the King of Death Gods? In chapter 27, Misa says
Does anybody know how Ryuk tricked the king of Gods and got his Death Note?

Why was Ryuk tied to Light's Death Note? In How to Use: XIII, in the second point it says
So is there an explanation as to how Ryuk was tied with Light's Death Note having stolen it from Sidoh?
